text:
Planned Work
STATION ENHANCEMENTS | 9:45 PM Fri, Jul 6 to 5 AM Mon, Jul 9
Pelham Bay Park-bound [6] trains skip 23 St, 28 St and 33 St in Manhattan


For service to these stations, take the [6] to Grand Central-42 St and transfer to a downtown [4] local or [6].

For service from these stations, take the [4] or [6] to 14 St-Union Sq and transfer to a
Pelham Bay Park-bound [6].

[ad] This service change affects one or more ADA accessible stations. Please call 511 for help with planning
your trip. If you are deaf or hard of hearing, use your preferred relay service provider or the free 711 relay.





Planned Work
TRACK MAINTENANCE | Jul 7 - 8, Sat and Sun, 6:45 AM to 7 PM
Brooklyn Bridge-bound [6] trains run express from Pelham Bay Park to Parkchester in the Bronx


For service to Buhre Av, Middletown Rd, Westchester Sq, Zerega and Castle Hill Avs,
take the [6] to Parkchester and transfer to a Pelham Bay Park-bound [6].

For service from these stations take the [6] to Pelham Bay Park and transfer to a
a Brooklyn Bridge-bound [6].




Planned Work
TRACK MAINTENANCE | Jul 7 - 8, Saturday & Sunday
[5] Trains run every 15 minutes between Dyre Av, the Bronx and Bowling Green, Manhattan






Planned Work
TRACK MAINTENANCE | Jul 7 - 8, Saturday & Sunday
[5] Trains run local in both directions between 125 St and Grand Central-42 St in Manhattan





Planned Work
TRACK MAINTENANCE | 12:01 AM Sat, Jul 7 to 5 AM Mon, Jul 9
[4] Trains run local in both directions between 125 St and Grand Central-42 St in Manhattan
